title: San Juan Island National Historical Park: Spring Street School Blitzes BioBlitz
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations     Spring Street School Blitzes BioBlitz                Spring Street School Blitzes the BioBlitz        Sharon Massey's Spring School class has been instrumental in preparing for and promoting the BioBlitz scheduled May 3-4 at American Camp. Utilizing a tablet camera s student sets up a shot. Jill Burton            Spring Street School Students Una, Mathew, Sol and Ronan take to the woods, field and beaches to demonstrate just a few of the locations where scientists and lay enthusiasts will tally the flora and fauna of American Camp during the BioBlitz scheduled May-34. (01.06)           San Juan Island National Historical Park is organizing a BioBlitz at American Camp May 3-4, 2014 from noon Saturday to noon Sunday. Watch this Spring Street School video and learn how much fun science can be in the perfect setting. (01.22)
